column1: Guisa is a municipality and town in the Granma Province of Cuba. It is located 19 kilometres (12 mi) south-east of Bayamo

column2: the municipality of Guisa had a population of 50
column3: 923. With a total area of 596 km2 (230 sq mi)
column4: it has a population density of 85.4/km2 (221/sq mi).
